dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8907 IH: Kevin and Avonte's Law Reauthorization Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Waters (for herself, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, and Mr. Michael F. Doyle of Pennsylvania) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Violent Crime Control and Law Enforcement Act of 1994, to reauthorize the Missing Americans Alert Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Kevin and Avonte's Law Reauthorization Act of 2022.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Missing Americans Alert Program
section.text: Section 240001(d) of the Violent Crime Control and Law Enforcement Act of 1994 (34 U.S.C. 12621(d)) is amended by striking 2018 through 2022 and inserting 2023 through 2027.
